ComicInfo.Summary:
The break out comic of 2017 continues with 2016 Harvey Award nominee David Baron and rising newcomer Yusuf Idris. On the hunt for her next illicit payday, Emma comes upon a devastating find. What she discovers is unimaginable: a deadly human trafficking ring and a plane full of stolen children held against their will hidden deep in its hull. At 30,000 feet any attempt to rescue the kidnapped children seems insane. Luckily for the stolen kids, Emma crossed over the line of sanity a long time ago.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Steve Morris | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike Norton | 2 |
